name: Meow Meow
description:
Meow Meow a Psychedelic Disco Game about cats!

Meow Meow is super easy to pick up and play. It's a one touch game, which means it works really well on things like the Apple TV and Mobile phones, it's also heaps of fun on PC and Mac as well!

We are trying really hard to make fun but simple games. There are lots of tactics and skills to learn if you get into it, but also you can just pass it to your friend who NEVER plays games, and we bet they start smiling really quickly…

We are a proper small team of just two here – so any support you can show us, like, telling your friends about the game, tweeting, facebooking… it's all REALLY REALLY appreciated and TOTALLY helps.

In return we will be supporting the game after its launch by adding new features (including new cats!!) as we hit certain numbers of players! Hold tight, and follow us on twitter and/or facebook for more news about this…

Music

Meow Meow features some stunning music tracks by truly amazing underground artists – if you like what you hear please check out these links for more sounds from Leo Electroid, S:tar Ofei, Nick Samovar, Antoine Nguyen, and Ubald Hirsch!!
